org.hps.recon.tracking

Class NoiselessReadoutChip.BasicChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.NoiselessReadoutChip.BasicChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadoutChip.ReadoutChannel
    Enclosing class:
    NoiselessReadoutChip

    private class NoiselessReadoutChip.BasicChannel
extends Object
implements ReadoutChip.ReadoutChannel
    BasicChannel class representing a single channel's behavior Note that binary readout is a special case. Anything positive value passed to a binary ADC for digitization is assumed to have crossed t hreshold and is assigned a value of 1. Decoding binary readout results in either 0 or dynamic_range.
